author: Special Correspondent
text:
The National Green Tribunal’s Southern Bench here would be shifted to a new premises before the end of this year, NGT Chairperson Justice Swatanter Kumar said here on Tuesday.

Justice Kumar was in the city to participate in the farewell function of Justice M. Chockalingam, who retired from the NGT. The NGT’s Southern Bench is presently functioning from a building on the Poonamallee High Road in Arumbakkam.
title: NGT to shift to new premises
